mapper.select:
select sum(si.ClWeight) AS tlWeight, COUNT(*) AS VCount,sum(si.NetWeight) as Proportion,mp.MatName from MP_StockIn si left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid left join (select MatName + '(' +MatSpecs+ ')' AS matName,compid,MatCode,empName from MP_MaterialInfor ) mp on si.compid =mp.compid and si.MatCode =mp.MatCode where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and mp.empName like '%'+#{empName}+'%'
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by mp.MatName order by mp.MatName

and Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by si.VehicleID ORDER BY si.VehicleID

SELECT convert ( varchar (10), SecondTime, 120) SecondTime, Sup_Name, mp.matName, SUM(si.ClWeight)AS tlWeight, COUNT(*) AS vCount from MP_StockIn si left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid left join (select MatName + '(' + MatSpecs+ ')' AS matName,compid,MatCode,empName from MP_MaterialInfor ) mp on si.compid =mp.compid and si.MatCode =mp.MatCode where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and mp.empName like '%'+#{empName}+'%'
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
GROUP BY convert ( varchar (10), SecondTime, 120),Sup_Name,mp.matName ORDER BY convert( varchar(10),SecondTime,120)

select sum(si.ClWeight) totalClWeight from MP_StockIn si left join MP_MaterialInfor mt on si.MatCode = mt.MatCode and si.compid = mt.compid left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and mt.empName like '%'+#{empName}+'%'
and si.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and sl.Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and mk.Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}

select sum(si.ClWeight) AS tlWeight, sl.Sup_Name as supName from MP_StockIn si left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid left join (select MatName + '(' +MatSpecs+ ')' AS matName,compid,MatCode,empName from MP_MaterialInfor ) mt on si.compid =mt.compid and si.MatCode =mt.MatCode where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and mt.empName like '%'+#{empName}+'%'
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}

select sum(si.ClWeight) AS tlWeight, mk.Sto_Name as stoName from MP_StockIn si left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and sl.empName like '%'+#{empName}+'%'
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by mk.Sto_Name ORDER BY tlWeight desc

select sum(si.ClWeight) AS tlWeight, mp.MatName as matName from MP_StockIn si left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid left join MP_Stock mk on mk.StkCode = si.StkCode and mk.compid = si.compid left join (select MatName + '(' + MatSpecs + ')' AS matName, compid, MatCode, empName, MatParent from MP_MaterialInfor) mp on si.compid = mp.compid and si.MatCode = mp.MatCode left join DD_PublicInfo dd on dd.compid = si.compid and dd.PI_Class = 64 and mp.MatParent=dd.PI_Values where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus = 1
and mp.empName like '%'+#{empName}+'%'
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and Sto_Name like '%'+#{stoName}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
and dd.PI_Values='S' or dd.PI_Values='G'
and dd.PI_Values='C' or dd.PI_Values='P' or dd.PI_Values='F' or dd.PI_Values='CY'
and dd.PI_Values='AE'
group by mp.MatName order by mp.MatName
